sections.heading: 1021 through 1040.77 of this title shall be known as the "Oklahoma Law on Obscenity and Child Sexual Abuse Material" and may be referred to by that designation
sections.text: Added by Laws 1968, c. 121, ยง 1, emerg. eff. April 4, 1968. Amended by Laws 2000, c. 208, ยง 13, eff. Nov. 1, 2000; Laws 2024, c. 59, ยง 19, e
